title: An Hyun Pil
description: Located near Daerim subway station, exit 2/3, across the road from exits 2 and 3, there is a side street, and the restaurant is down that street on the left. This is a health institute which provides nutrition education. Its sells health food such as grains, tea, flours, etc., and is also a restaurant serving dishes made with organic brown rice. Please confirm if everything is vegan and inform HappyCow.
